CustomField.formula: IF( LEFT(Product_Code_Copy__c,3)="LIC", IF(AND( SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c <36,NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c))), IF(Deal_Reg_Discount__c, SBQQ__ListPrice__c *0.75/12, SBQQ__ListPrice__c/12), IF(AND(SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c<60,NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c))),IF( Deal_Reg_Discount__c, SBQQ__ListPrice__c*0.75/12, SBQQ__ListPrice__c*0.8/12), IF(AND(SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c<84,NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c))),SBQQ__ListPrice__c*0.7/12, SBQQ__ListPrice__c*0.7/12))), IF( Deal_Reg_Discount__c,SBQQ__ListPrice__c*0.75,SBQQ__ListPrice__c))
CustomField.label: Suggested Sales Price
